column1: - If you have had back pain before, is this pain similar or different?
- Do you feel the pain anywhere else, such as in your hip, thigh, leg or feet?
Tell your health care provider if you have had weight loss, fever, a change in urination or bowel habits, or a history of cancer.
Your health care provider will perform a physical exam to try to find the exact location of your pain, and determine how it affects your movement.
Your provider will touch your skin in many places, using a pin, cotton swab, or feather.
